abstract: List of errors in the Apple Pay sheet.
overview:
## Discussion

If the Apple Pay sheet contains errors, you provide a [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus/failure] status to [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentAuthorizationResult], and include the individual errors in this array. If there are no errors, you provide a [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus/success] status and leave the error array empty. Errors are of the standard type, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError]. To create errors, you can either use the convenience methods found in [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest], or create an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] using the domain, error codes, and user info from [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentError].

Add the errors to the array in order of severity, with the most important error first.

# errors

**Instance Property**

List of errors in the Apple Pay sheet.

## Declaration

```swift
var errors: [any Error]! { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the Apple Pay sheet contains errors, you provide a [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus/failure] status to [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentAuthorizationResult], and include the individual errors in this array. If there are no errors, you provide a [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus/success] status and leave the error array empty. Errors are of the standard type, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError]. To create errors, you can either use the convenience methods found in [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest], or create an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] using the domain, error codes, and user info from [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentError].

Add the errors to the array in order of severity, with the most important error first.

## Setting payment authorization status and errors

- **status**: Payment authorization general status.
- **PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus**: General success and failure status for payment authorization.

items.description: General success and failure status for payment authorization.
